resources.string: Tap the card to reveal one criteria. \nIf not enough, tap again. \nCheck the family mode for naive criterias.
Click on the button below to make a choice!

string-array.name: not_family
string-array.item: "The one that lost the virginity at the oldest age"
"The one that lost the virginity at the youngest age"
"The one that most recently had a hangover"
